CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Assignment_Name_Override__c)),Assignment_Name_Override__c, IF(pse__Is_Billable__c = FALSE, pse__Resource__r.psa_report__Resource_Name__c+" "+"Non-bill"+"-"+TEXT(pse__Role__c), IF(AND(pse__Is_Billable__c = TRUE, WAR__c = TRUE), pse__Resource__r.psa_report__Resource_Name__c + " "+"WAR"+"-"+TEXT(pse__Role__c), pse__Resource__r.psa_report__Resource_Name__c+"-"+TEXT(pse__Role__c))))
CustomField.label: Project Planner Name
